get.summary: RPC method for searching cases.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of results per page.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: General query string.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: List of specific case IDs to retrieve.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria (e.g., field:asc).

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: List of fields to include in the response.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Key-value pairs for additional filtering.

parameters.name: contact_id
parameters.description: Contact ID for filtering cases.

parameters.name: qin
parameters.description: Specify which fields to apply 'q' to.

parameters.name: filters_v1
parameters.description: Updated filters with CEL syntax.

post.summary: RPC method for creating a new case.

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: Input data for creating the case.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: List of fields to include in the response.

parameters.name: disableTrigger
parameters.description:
Indicates whether to disable the trigger after the application execution.
Default is false (trigger **will** be executed).
Set to true to explicitly prevent the trigger from running (e.g., when called from another trigger or internal flow).
то
[WTEL-7055]

get.summary: Retrieve a list of catalogs or search catalogs

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of records per page

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
Fields to be retrieved as a result.
If the user passes "-" as the value for fields,
it will retrieve all available fields for each catalog.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting options by fields

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: List of IDs to filter the catalogs

parameters.name: query
parameters.description:
Search query string for filtering by name. Supports:
- Wildcards (*) for substring matching
- Placeholder (?) for single character substitution
- Exact match for full names

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Filter by state (true for active, false for inactive)

parameters.name: depth
parameters.description:
Filter by the depth of the hierarchy to retrieve services.
The depth indicates how many ancestor levels of services
will be included for each catalog.
- A depth of 0 includes only the direct catalog.
- A depth of 1 includes the catalog and its immediate services.
- By default the depth is limited by 3,
  meaning all nested services and sub-services will be included.

parameters.name: sub_fields
parameters.description:
Fields to be retrieved as a result for [SUBSERVICES].
If the user passes "-" as the value for fields,
it will retrieve all available fields for each catalog subservices.

parameters.name: hasSubservices
parameters.description: Filter catalogs with subservices

get.summary: Locate a catalog by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the catalog to be located

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
Fields to be retrieved as a result.
If the user passes "-" as the value for fields,
it will retrieve all available fields for each catalog.

parameters.name: sub_fields
parameters.description:
Fields to be retrieved as a result for [SUBSERVICES].
If the user passes "-" as the value for fields,
it will retrieve all available fields for each catalog subservices.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the catalog to be deleted

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the catalog to be updated

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: Input data for updating the catalog

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the catalog to be updated

parameters.description: Input data for updating the catalog

get.summary: Retrieve a list of sources or search sources

parameters.name: page
parameters.description:
Page number of result dataset records. offset = (page * size)
Default: 0

parameters.name: size
parameters.description:
Size count of records on result page. limit = (size++)
Default: 25

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
Fields to be retrieved as a result.
Default: [] (all fields)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Sort the result according to fields.
Default: "id:desc"

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Filter by unique IDs.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description:
Search query string for filtering by name. Supports:
- Wildcards (*)
- Placeholder (?)
- Exact match

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
Filter by source type.

 - TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified source type.
 - CALL: Phone call source type.
 - CHAT: Chat source type.
 - SOCIAL_MEDIA: Social media source type.
 - EMAIL: Email source type.
 - API: API source type.
 - MANUAL: Manual source type.

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: Main input payload for the source being created

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
Optional list of specific fields to return after creation

Specific fields to include in response

put.summary: RPC method for updating an existing case.

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: Input data with updated fields.

assignee.title: create: not required, default from service or set by UI;

reporter.title: create: required (if empty recognize as anonymous contact);

impacted.title: create: required, default is reporter or ui (if empty recognize as anonymous);

group.title: create: not required, default from service or set by UI;

status.title: create: not required, default initial value from status lookup or ui;

priority.title: create: not required, default first value from priority lookup

service.title: on this field base many other readonly fields on return

close_result.title: create: not required; update: required only when case status goes to the final state

userID.description: Optional creator / updater ID. Use this to explicitly set the case creator / updater instead of deriving it from the auth token.

parameters.name: x_json_mask
parameters.description: List of JSON fields to update.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: List of fields to include in the response.

parameters.name: disableTrigger
parameters.description:
Indicates whether to disable the trigger after the application execution.
Default is false (trigger **will** be executed).
Set to true to explicitly prevent the trigger from running (e.g., when called from another trigger or internal flow).

[WTEL-7055]

google.protobuf.NullValue.description:
`NullValue` is a singleton enumeration to represent the null value for the
`Value` type union.

The JSON representation for `NullValue` is JSON `null`.

 - NULL_VALUE: Null value.

created_at.description: Creation timestamp (in milliseconds since Unix epoch).

updated_at.description: Last update timestamp (in milliseconds since Unix epoch).

name.description: Name of the case (may serve as an ID in docs).

close_reason_group.description: Close reason group, immutable once set.

author.description: Author or reporter of the case.

assignee.description: Assignee responsible for resolving the case.

reporter.description: Reporter of the issue (null if anonymous).

impacted.description: Impacted contact (defaults to reporter if null).

comments.description: List of comments on the case.

id.description: Main identifier for read, update, and delete operations.

ver.description: Version number of the comment, used for concurrency control.

created_at.description: Timestamp (in milliseconds) of when the comment was created.

updated_by.description: User who last updated the comment.

updated_at.description: Timestamp (in milliseconds) of the last update.

edited.description: Indicates if the comment was edited; true if created_at < updated_at.

can_edit.description: Indicates if the comment can be edited by current user.

case_id.description: Optional relation to the associated case.

webitel.cases.CaseComment.description: Represents a comment associated with a case.

next.description: Flag to indicate if more pages are available.

items.description: List of comments on the current page.

webitel.cases.CaseCommentList.description: Contains a paginated list of comments.

communication_type.description: Type of the communication (e.g., Chat, Call).

next.description: Indicator if there is a next page.

webitel.cases.CaseFileList.description: Contains a list of case files with pagination.

etag.title: main field required for read, update and delete

next.description: Flag indicating if there are more pages.

webitel.cases.CaseList.description: Response message containing a list of cases.

reporter.description: Required reporter ID (if empty, anonymous contact).

status.description: Initial case status (default from lookup or UI).

service.description: Service ID (affects many other readonly fields).

links.description: List of links attached to the case.

userID.description: Optional creator / updater ID. Use this to explicitly set the case creator / updater instead of deriving it from the auth token.

group.title: Group ID responsible for the service

assignee.title: Assignee ID responsible for the service

id.description: Unique identifier for the related case.

etag.description: Etag for the related case entity.

ver.description: Version number of the related case, used for concurrency control.

created_at.description: Timestamp (in milliseconds) of when the relation was created.

updated_by.description: User who last updated the relation.

updated_at.description: Timestamp (in milliseconds) of the last update.

webitel.cases.RelatedCase.description: Represents a related case with its relationship details.

next.description: Flag to indicate if more pages are available.

data.description: List of related cases on the current page.

webitel.cases.RelatedCaseLookup.description: RelatedCaseLookup is created specifically to include the subject field.

webitel.cases.RelationType.description: Enum for relation types between cases.

valid_from.title: Validity period for the SLA - optional

calendar.title: Calendar ID from the "Calendars" dictionary - required

webitel.cases.SLA.title: SLA message represents an SLA entity with metadata

priorities.title: Priorities associated with the SLACondition - fetched as Lookup entities [ Priority name + ID ]

sla_id.title: SLA ID associated with the SLACondition

state.title: State of the service (true for active, false for inactive)

created_at.title: Timestamp when the service was created

updated_at.title: Timestamp when the service was last updated

updated_by.title: User who last updated the service

searched.title: flag showing whether the catalog was searched

webitel.cases.Service.title: Service message represents a service entity within a catalog

next.title: Indicates if there are more pages

webitel.cases.ServiceList.title: ServiceList message contains a list of services with pagination

id.description: Unique identifier for the source, generated automatically.

name.description: A unique, descriptive name for the source.

description.description: An optional longer explanation of the source's purpose.

type.description: The type of data source represented by this entry.

created_at.description: Unix timestamp representing when the source was created.

updated_at.description: Unix timestamp representing the most recent update.

created_by.description: Reference to the user who originally created this source.

updated_by.description: Reference to the user who most recently modified this source.

webitel.cases.Source.description: Represents a data source in the contact management system.

page.description: Page number of the partial result.

webitel.cases.SourceType.description:
Represents a source type for the source entity.

 - TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified source type.
 - CALL: Phone call source type.
 - CHAT: Chat source type.
 - SOCIAL_MEDIA: Social media source type.
 - EMAIL: Email source type.
 - API: API source type.
 - MANUAL: Manual source type.

created_at.title: CreatedAt timestamp of the close reason

updated_at.title: UpdatedAt timestamp of the close reason

created_by.title: CreatedBy user of the close reason

updated_by.title: UpdatedBy user of the close reason

webitel.cases.Status.title: Status message represents a status entity with metadata

status_id.title: Status ID of the status condition

created_at.title: CreatedAt timestamp of the status condition

updated_at.title: UpdatedAt timestamp of the status condition

created_by.title: CreatedBy user of the status condition

updated_by.title: UpdatedBy user of the status condition

webitel.cases.StatusCondition.title: StatusCondition message represents a status entity with metadata

webitel.cases.StatusList.title: StatusList message contains a list of Status items with pagination
